name: Unpackerr
short_desc: Extracts downloads for Radarr, Sonarr, Lidarr, Readarr and cleans up after import
author: Unpackerr
description: Unpackerr monitors your Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and Readarr download queues and automatically extracts RAR and ZIP archives when downloads complete. It integrates seamlessly with the *arr apps to ensure your media files are ready for import.

form_fields.label: Sonarr URL
form_fields.hint: Internal URL for Sonarr (e.g., http://sonarr:8989). Leave empty if not using Sonarr.

form_fields.label: Sonarr API Key
form_fields.hint: API key from Sonarr (Settings > General > Security). Leave empty if not using Sonarr.

form_fields.label: Radarr URL
form_fields.hint: Internal URL for Radarr (e.g., http://radarr:7878). Leave empty if not using Radarr.

form_fields.label: Radarr API Key
form_fields.hint: API key from Radarr (Settings > General > Security). Leave empty if not using Radarr.

form_fields.label: Lidarr URL
form_fields.hint: Internal URL for Lidarr (e.g., http://lidarr:8686). Leave empty if not using Lidarr.

form_fields.label: Lidarr API Key
form_fields.hint: API key from Lidarr. Leave empty if not using Lidarr.

form_fields.label: Readarr URL
form_fields.hint: Internal URL for Readarr (e.g., http://readarr:8787). Leave empty if not using Readarr.

form_fields.label: Readarr API Key
form_fields.hint: API key from Readarr. Leave empty if not using Readarr.
